Rúmil: caption="Rúmil, Elven Protector" from ''[[The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game]]''

{{disambig-more: Rúmil was the brother of [[Haldir]] and [[Orophin]]. He was one of three wardens met by the [[Fellowship of the Ring
'''2001-7: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game]]'':'''

:An elf of Lórien is identified as being Rúmil in three cards, [http://lotrtcgdb.com/pages/LOTR12022.html Rumil, Brother of Haldir (12C22)], [http://lotrtcgdb.com/pages/LOTR17012.html Rumil, Silvan Elf (17S12)] and [http://lotrtcgdb.com/pages/LOTR01057.html Rumil, Elven Protector (1U57)].
